org.eclipse.paho.android.service

Class AlarmPingSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.paho.android.service.AlarmPingSender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3.MqttPingSender

    public class AlarmPingSender
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3.MqttPingSender
    Default ping sender implementation on Android. It is based on AlarmManager.

    This class implements the MqttPingSender pinger interface allowing applications to send ping packet to server every keep alive interval.

    See Also:
    MqttPingSender
